image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Mississippi; born in Tupelo, Lee County, Miss., October 9, 1958; B.S., Mississippi State University, Mississippi State, Miss., 1980; business owner; member of the Mississippi state senate, 1995-2010; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Twelfth and to the two succeeding Congresses; served until his death on February 6, 2015 (January 3, 2011-February 6, 2015); died on February 6, 2015, in Tupelo, Miss.

researchRecord.name: ca. 2011-2015, 6 linear feet.
researchRecord.description: The papers of Congressman Alan Nunnelee include correspondence, photographs, and memorabilia including small and large framed artwork from Nunnelee's legislative and congressional years, news clippings primarily spanning 2011-2015, and Mississippi State University-related clothing and memorabilia. Books from the collection are located in the CPRC's reading room..
